sentences.pinyin: Zhège dìfāng de fēngguāng hěn měi.
sentences.translation: The scenery of this place is very beautiful.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然经过了一天的旅行，但是看到了这里的风光，所有的疲劳都消散了。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然經過了一天的旅行，但是看到了這裡的風光，所有的疲勞都消散了。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán jīngguòle yītiān de lǚxíng, dànshì kàn dàole zhèlǐ de fēngguāng, suǒyǒu de píláo dōu xiāosànle.
sentences.translation: Although I have been traveling for a day, seeing the scenery here dispels all the fatigue.

sentences.pinyin: Zhègè chéngshì de fēngguāng hěn měi.
sentences.translation: The scenery of this city is beautiful.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我旅行的目的是为了欣赏不同地方的风光。
sentences.traditionalText: 我旅行的目的是為了欣賞不同地方的風光。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ lǚxíng de mùdì shì wèile xīnshǎng bùtóng dìfāng de fēngguāng.
sentences.translation: The purpose of my travel is to appreciate the sights of different places.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他的成功让他在社区风光无限。
sentences.traditionalText: 他的成功讓他在社區風光無限。
sentences.pinyin: tā de chéng gōng ràng tā zài shè qū fēng guāng wú xiàn。
sentences.translation: His success made him highly respected in the community.

sentences.simplifiedText: 通过他的艰苦努力，他在商界风光无比，赢得了同行的尊重和欣赏。
sentences.traditionalText: 通過他的艱苦努力，他在商界風光無比，贏得了同行的尊重和欣賞。
sentences.pinyin: tōng guò tā de jiān kǔ nǔ lì ，tā zài shāng jiè fēng guāng wú bǐ ，yíng dé le tóng háng de zūn zhòng hé xīn shǎng。
sentences.translation: Through his hard work, he gained an unparalleled reputation in the business world, earning the respect and admiration of his peers.

sentences.pinyin: zhè gè chéng shì fēi cháng fēng guāng.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在夕阳下，古老的城堡显得异常风光。
sentences.traditionalText: 在夕陽下，古老的城堡顯得異常風光。
sentences.pinyin: zài xī yáng xià, gǔ lǎo de chéng bǎo xiǎn dé yì cháng fēng guāng.
sentences.translation: Under the setting sun, the ancient castle appears extraordinarily grand.
